overview:
Stigasoft is an IT & ITeS services provider with strong customer-focus and solution-orientation.

Stigasoft offers a broad spectrum of delivery models leveraged by offshore facilities and fulfillment center located in India.

Stigasoft has acquired a high degree of expertise in providing software development and allied IT services - both for domestic and international partners. Our teams possess extensive professional experience in developing, deploying and maintaining robust, state-of-the-art, scalable and, above all, cost-effective IT solutions around the world.

Services:

Stigasoft’s client covers several industries and countries and the services provided can be divided into four main areas;

  1. Application Services (designing, development, integration, re-engineering, migration)
  2. Mobile/iPad Application Development (for iPhone, Symbian, Android and Blackberry)
  3. SAP (Functional and Configurational)
  4. BPO services (Customer/Technical Support and Fraud Screening)

Our clients have experienced great synergies between our 4 main service areas.
